title: One Wish (feat. Boston Symphony Orchestra)
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Recorded live at Tanglewood with members of the Boston Symphony Orchestra and an all-star cast, this tale with Indian, Irish, and Jewish roots proves that wishes can come true —sometimes all at once!
